\N<Man>Isn't that Miss Segi? If you have no business here, it's
better not to go any further.

\N<Man>This place used to be a school for the town's children, but
now it has completely transformed into an educational
facility for Ruda.
A

\N<Luda Soldier>As a life-prolonging measure for your husband who is
imprisoned, you are obligated to pay gold every 5 days
during the training period.

\N<Luda Soldier>The amount you are required to pay this time is \C[1][1250
MO]\C[0].
\N<Luda Soldier>Are you prepared to make the payment this time?\$

\N<Luda Soldier>Hmm... indeed. You have worked hard. It would be good for
you to continue to do so.

\N<Luda Soldier>However... should you stop the payments out of self-
preservation, we will simply carry out the sentence
methodically.

conditions.

\N<Segi>...

\N<Luda Soldier>What's wrong? Silence won't start anything. Do what you must
do.
\N<Segi>Th-that is...

\N<Luda Soldier>...I see. I understand everything. It seems you were not up
to the task after all.

\N<Segi>W-wait, please! If you could just wait a little longer, I
will definitely have the money...!

\N<Luda Soldier>You have already been given ample time. There will be no
further leniency.
\N<Segi>But, but...!!

\N<Luda Soldier>Come now. I said you were not up to the task, but
fortunately, it seems you still have some value to us.

\N<Luda Soldier>You've done well, continue to strive in the future.
<ActiveMessage:\C[1]■Event■>
\N<Segi>You're the one from the other day...
\N<Red Cap Boy>Wh-what... Aunty, do you need something from me...?

\N<Segi>There's no need to be so wary. I'm Segi, Riia's mother, and
I attend the same training facility as you.

\N<Segi>I've heard about you from Riia and Rame-chan. I hope we can
get along well from now on, okay?
\N<Red Cap Boy>Riia's... mom? And you've heard about me from Rame-chan...?
